code: import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{getBookings}from"../redux/action";import{Button}from'@chakra-ui/react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BookingItem(_ref){var id=_ref.id,movie_id=_ref.movie_id,name=_ref.name,seat=_ref.seat;var dispatch=useDispatch();function handlecancelBooking(id){fetch("http://localhost:8080/moviesBooked/".concat(id),{method:'DELETE'});dispatch(getBookings());}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{margin:"10px",padding:"10px",borderRadius:"5px",border:"1px solid teal"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Movie I.d: ",movie_id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Name : ",name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Seat : ",seat]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:function onClick(){return handlecancelBooking(id);},children:"CANCEL BOOKING"})]});}
